name: The Anchor
personality: Detached, calm, speaks like they’re halfway in a dream.
description: A person who stands at the geometric center of the triangle. Their presence stabilizes — or destabilizes — the anomaly. They feel every hum, every echo, every shift.

idle: I hear all three points breathing.
player_present: You carry echoes from the edges.
triangle_active: Three points… one truth… not yet revealed.
resonance_event: The hum is inside my bones.
Something is trying to speak through the pattern.

notes: The Anchor is the keystone NPC for the triangle anomaly. They feel all three points simultaneously. Never reveals the truth directly.
